verse.name: c
verse.lines: I want to go to Heaven, that Home so bright and fair; So beautiful, and—best of all—Dear Jesus will be there!

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: I’ll see old Noah, Moses, Elijah, Daniel, Paul, And all the millions since that time who gave to God their all; The many little children who’ve died before they’re old Are singing ’round the throne of God, and play on streets of gold!

verse.name: v4
